title: BBC Local Live: Leeds and West Yorkshire on Monday 8 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: twelve men jailed for 'des abuse of girl in keighley .
domestic crimes recorded in west yorkshire up by almost 5,000 .
family of six escape from house fire in halifax .
man arrested for attempted murder after leeds shooting .
calder valley craig whittaker to raise business flood insurance availability in parliament .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for leeds and west yorkshire have finished for the day .
we 'll be back from 08:00 on tuesday 9 february with the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates from across the county .
if you spot something happening in your local area , you can always get in touch with us by email .

documents.title: more news from west yorkshire : coming up on bbc look north
text: join us on bbc one at 18:30 for look north as 12 men are jailed for a total of 130 years for the sexual exploitation of teenage girls in keighley .
plus , west yorkshire police have announced they will recruit around 300 new officers over the next year .
we will bring you the full details .
author: BBC Look North, Yorkshire

documents.title: west yorkshire 's weather : windy with further showers this evening
text: staying windy with further showers , locally heavy and possibly wintry over the hills , but becoming mainly confined to pennine parts of west yorkshire .
minimum temperature of about 2c ( 36f ) .
tomorrow , many areas starting dry and bright .
turning cloudy with patchy rain spreading southwards .
author: Paul Hudson
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: latest headlines : twelve men jailed for sexual offences against keighley teenager and domestic crimes recorded in west yorkshire up by almost 5,000
text: the top stories in leeds and west yorkshire so far this evening include :
author: Oli Woodcock
BBC Local Live

documents.title: princess royal opens new robotic surgery theatre at st james ' hospital
text: there 's been a royal visit in leeds today .
her royal highness princess anne officially opened the adult robotic surgery theatre at st james ' hospital .

documents.title: wakefield trinity wildcats ' belle vue stadium on market for £ 600,000
text: wakefield trinity wildcats ' stadium has been put on the market for £ 600,000 .
author: Wakefield Express

documents.title: listen : leeds united head coach looking to add players
text: leeds united head coach steve evans says he is looking to add players to his squad .
he is looking for quality and creativity when the loan market opens tomorrow .
evans says he feels his squad needs up to four new faces
author: BBC West Yorkshire Sport

text: we 're welcoming in the chinese new year here at bbc yorkshire .
follow the celebrations throughout the afternoon on bbc radio leeds .
we 're welcoming in the chinese new year !
hear more on @ twitterid shortly

documents.title: e-fit released after teenage girl sexually assaulted in halifax
text: detectives have released an e-fit of a man they want to trace after a 15-year-old girl was sexually assaulted as she walked along a road in halifax .
author: Halifax Courier

documents.title: travel update : one lane closed on the m62 , between j26 and j27
text: one lane is closed on the m62 eastbound between j26 , m606 ( chain bar ) and j27 , m621 ( gildersome ) , because of an accident involving a van and two cars .
traffic is now building and this is causing delays .
radio leeds has travel and traffic updates throughout the evening to keep you moving .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: public can apply to become west yorkshire police officer for first time in five years
text: west yorkshire police are to recruit hundreds of new officers for the first time in five years .
it 's after an increased budget for the force was approved .
the police and crime commissioner for west yorkshire expects around 300 more officers to be recruited this year , with an increase in the number of special constables and pcsos .

documents.title: yorkshire devolution deadlock : who will blink first ?
text: george osborne is pinning his political ambitions on creating a patchwork of devolved regions across yorkshire , lancashire and the north east whose mutual co-operation will transform his concept of a northern powerhouse into reality .

but , with no end in sight to the deadlock blocking his ambitions for sealing devolution deals for yorkshire , it could be a case of who blinks first , writes bbc yorkshire political editor len tingle in his latest blog .

documents.title: keighley sex abuse : prosecutor condemns 'des crimes '
text: prosecutors have been reacting to the sentencing of 12 men for the sexual abuse of a teenage girl in keighley .

helen gaunt , reviewing lawyer at the complex casework unit of the crown prosecution service in yorkshire and humberside , said : `` these 12 men are responsible for des crimes involving child sexual exploitation and abuse .
`` their victims were young , naïve and vulnerable and were deliberately targeted : one girl was threatened , exploited and raped .
a second girl was also threatened and raped .
these two young women have shown immense bravery in reporting these matters to the police and in providing evidence to enable us to bring a strong prosecution case against their abusers .
the lengthy sentences passed today send out a very strong message to all those who may be hesitating about coming forward to report matters such as these . ''

documents.title: gang who raped and abused vulnerable keighley schoolgirl locked up for 140 years
text: a gang of 12 men who raped and took `` terrible and heartless sexual advantage '' of a vulnerable keighley schoolgirl before `` casting her aside '' have been locked up for a total of 140 years .
author: Bradford Telegraph and Argus

documents.title: keighley sex abuse gang : full list of jail sentences
text: twelve men have been jailed for sexual offences against a vulnerable teenage schoolgirl in keighley .
here is a full list of the sentences they were given at bradford crown court today :

documents.title: keighley sex abuse gang : kabir gets longest term of 20 years
text: yasser kabir ( who received the longest jail term of 20 years , was also sentenced for 12 sexual offences against two other young girls after being found guilty at a separate trial .
peter hampton , prosecuting , aid the abuse took place over a period of two years when one girl was aged between six and seven and the other was aged between seven and nine .
judge roger thomas said all four victims had suffered `` severe psychological harm '' .

documents.title: keighley sex abuse gang : full list of convictions
text: a group of 12 men who sexually exploited a vulnerable teenage girl in keighley have been sentenced at bradford crown court today .
eleven of the men were jailed at bradford crown court after being convicted of raping the girl in keighley , west yorkshire , when she was aged between 13 and 14 .
a 12th man was sentenced for sexual activity with the same girl .

tauqeer hussain , 23 , yasser kabir , 25 , and sufyan ziarab , 23 , all of keighley ; bilal ziarab , 21 , of bradford ; and israr ali , 19 , nasir khan , 24 , saqib younis , 29 , hussain sardar , 19 , zain ali , 20 , and faisal khan , all of keighley , were all found guilty of rape .
hussain was also convicted of raping a second teenage girl in 2009 .
taxi driver mohammed akram , 63 , of holker street , keighley , was found guilty of sexual activity with the first girl after offering her a lift .
the court heard there was no evidence he pressured the teenager to engage in sexual activity and he did not know the other men .
khalid raja mahmood , 34 , pleaded guilty to two charges of rape and three charges of sexual activity with a child .

documents.title: keighley sex abuse gang : judge says crimes were 'terrible and heartless '
text: more on the news that .

a group of 12 men who sexually exploited a vulnerable teenage schoolgirl for their own `` selfish , sexual gratification '' have received jail sentences rranging from three-and-a-half years to 20 years .
a trial last year heard how the teenager was repeatedly raped by the men in encounters arranged by a violent drug dealer over a period of 13 months between 2011 and 2012 .
on one occasion , the girl was gang-raped by five of the defendants .
the recorder of bradford judge roger thomas said : `` she was only 13 or 14 when the 12 of you took such terrible and heartless sexual advantage of her . ''

documents.title: breakingeleven men jailed for raping teenage girls in keighley
text: eleven men have been jailed at bradford crown court for a total of more than 130 years for raping girls aged between 13 and 14 in keighley .
a 12th man was also jailed for sexual activity with a girl .
more to follow

documents.title: west yorkshire 's weather : very windy , cold and showery
text: a windy afternoon for many us with the risk of gales .
squally areas of showery rain spreading east with some brighter spells too .
feeling cold in a strong and gusty wind .
a maximum temperature of about 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Keeley Donovan
BBC Look North

documents.title: princess royal to visit leeds today
text: her royal highness the princess royal will be visiting west yorkshire today .
during her visit to leeds , princess anne will be opening a robotic theatre at st james ' hospital as well as the headquarters of a national campaign to get more women into engineering .
this morning she will arrive at the thackray medical museum in leeds , a century on from her great-grandfather king george v 's visit to the then east leeds military war hospital .

documents.title: calls for radical overhaul of leeds bus services
text: transport bosses have issued a rallying call for an overhaul of bus services in leeds and west yorkshire - amid shouts of what 's good enough for london is good enough for us '' .
author: Yorkshire Evening Post

documents.title: watch : famous flying scotsman goes full steam ahead
text: flying scotsman , one of the world 's most famous locomotives , has returned to the west coast mainline .
railway enthusiasts welcomed its return following a £ 4.2m restoration project , which lasted 10 years .
i joined enthusiasts to witness saturday 's journey .
author: Olivia Richwald
Journalist, BBC Look North

documents.title: travel update : reduced service on northern rail between carlisle and leeds
text: replacement bus service running on northern rail between carlisle and appleby and there is also a reduced service on northern rail between carlisle and leeds due to landslide at appleby .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 50,000 people sign petition to save huddersfield a & e service
text: the fight to save huddersfield 's a & e service has reached a milestone .
more than 50,000 people have added their names to a government petition to keep services at the town 's royal infirmary .
author: Huddersfield Examiner

documents.title: yorkshire air ambulance to buy new £ 5m helicopter
text: yorkshire air ambulance is buying a second new helicopter for the region .
it announced last year it 'd be replacing one of its aircraft with a new model .
the helicopter will cost around £ 5m .

documents.title: watch : happy valley returns to bbc screens this week
text: it was one of the stand-out shows of recent years and was written by huddersfield 's sally wainwright .
one drama happy valley returns to our screens tomorrow .
the show was filmed in the calder valley , here in west yorkshire .
watch a sneak peek here :

documents.title: attempted murder arrest over leeds shooting
text: a man has been arrested on sus of attempted murder after a shooting in leeds .
a 19-year-old man was shot in the leg in stainbeck road on thursday .
he remains in hospital , where his condition is described as stable , west yorkshire police said .

documents.title: family of six escape halifax house fire
text: a family of six had a lucky escape when a fire started at their halifax home in the early hours this morning .
author: Halifax Courier

documents.title: travel update : traffic light failure on a653 , marsh lane in leeds
text: a traffic light failure on the a653 , marsh lane in leeds ( near the shannon street junction ) is causing delays for drivers this morning .
as ever , bbc radio leeds has travel and traffic updates throughout the morning to keep you moving .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: huddersfield town : possible loan extension for husband
text: huddersfield town head coach david wagner hopes to extend the loan of middlesbrough defender james husband beyond the current agreement .
born in leeds , husband started his professional career at doncaster rovers in his teenage years .
he 's a player wagner rates highly .
we need a left back and from my point everything is prepared that it could be james .
he 's totally accepted in the group and he 's done well .
we 're happy he is with us . ''
author: BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: latest headlines : domestic crimes recorded in west yorkshire up by almost 5,000 and police continue to question man over leeds shooting

author: Oli Woodcock

text: a windy day with the risk of gales .
squally areas of showery rain spreading east with some brighter spells too .
watch my full forecast here :
a maximum temperature of about 8c ( 46f ) .
author: Keeley Donovan
BBC Look North

documents.title: travel update : delays on the m1 between j41 & j42
text: an accident on the m1 northbound between j41 , a650 ( carrgate ) and j42 , m62 ( lofthouse ) is causing delays this morning .
please do approach with care .
radio leeds has travel and traffic updates throughout the morning to keep you moving .

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: hello and welcome to bbc local live in leeds and west yorkshire on monday 8 february 2016 .
oli with you until 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates from across the county .
why not get in touch with us today ?
i 'm looking forward to hearing your news , views and comments .
author: Oli Woodcock
BBC Local Live
